xwikidoc.title: How do I export a patient record as XAR

property.answer:
For individual patient records, there is an //Export XAR// option in the //More Actions// menu in the top right corner of the page, but **that entry is only shown for "advanced" users.**
If you do not see that option, then you must switch your user type from simple to advanced:
1. open your user profile by clicking on your name in the upper right corner 1. click the pencil icon on the right of //Personal Information// 1. open the //Preferences// tab from the list on the left 1. change the //User Type// option to ##Advanced## 1. save
The option //Export XAR// should now show up in the //More Actions// menu for all patient records.
